table.name: vtiger_listairlines
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listairlines` ( `listairlinesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `airlines` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `country` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `popular` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listairlinesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_listairlinescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listairlinescf` ( `listairlinesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listairlinesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
